tweet.text: Ruth A. Davis served as Consul General in Barcelona, #Spain and Ambassador to #Benin. She was the 1st African American female Director of @FSIatState and the 1st African American female @StateDG. She was named Career Ambassador in 2002. https://t.co/g37TFX1Zyh #BlackHistoryMonth https://t.co/R4CopQ5EYk
tweet.html: Ruth A. Davis served as Consul General in Barcelona, #Spain and Ambassador to #Benin. She was the 1st African American female Director of @FSIatState and the 1st African American female @StateDG. She was named Career Ambassador in 2002. go.usa.gov/xnFMj #BlackHistoryMonth
